question:
[Joanne] wanted to visit her grandmother [Dorothy], but [Dorothy] was asleep. [Janet] and her sister, [Marilyn], frequently bicker. However, they always make up quickly. [Helen] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Joanne]. [Kent] and his sister [Helen] went out for ice cream. [Janet] went over to her uncle [Kent]'s house for dinner. [Florence] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Marilyn].
Question: How is [Dorothy] related to [Florence]?
